data.title: Steven Spielberg Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Steven Spielberg on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Steven Spielberg including Masters of the Air, Twister, and more.
data.text:
Josh Brolin/Gotye

Sketches include Brolin Returns Monologue, The Californians, An SNL Digital Short: Laser Cats 7, Weekend Update (including Fred & Kristen as Garth & Kat), Piers Morgan, and Principal Frye â Prom. America's premier sketch-comedy show returns for its 37th season LIVE from Studio 8H in New York City. Â This season, the cast includes Fred Armisen, Abby Elliott, Bill Hader, Seth Meyers, Bobby Moynihan, Nasim Pedrad, Andy Samberg, Jason Sudeikis, Kenan Thompson, Kristen Wiig, featuring Vanessa Bayer, Taran Killam, Kate McKinnon, and Jay Pharoah. Â Check out these selected sketches and segments from each of this season's episodes, so you can make every night a Saturday Night.

Space

George Lucas, Zoe Saldana, Jeff Goldblum and others imagine what waits for us in outer space - and how will those discoveries change who we are?

Aliens

Are we alone in the universe? Steven Spielberg, Ridley Scott, Sigourney Weaver and others ponder what aliens teach us about ourselves.

Monsters

Guillermo del Toro, Ridley Scott, Milla Jovovich and others explore what terrifies us about monsters and why we like being scared so much.
